segments.source_content:
---
title: BoxyHQ Developer Guides
description: BoxyHQ's official guides for Single Sign-On (SSO) and Directory Sync.
hide_table_of_contents: true
---

BoxyHQ’s extensive collection of developer guides is crafted to accelerate your integration with our cutting-edge products and APIs. Whether you’re deploying SAML Jackson, implementing Directory Sync with Express.js and Next.js, or integrating SAML Jackson into frameworks like Django, Laravel, Next.js, Remix, or Rails, our ever-expanding library is your go-to resource.

translations.zh-CN: BoxyHQ丰富的开发者指南库旨在加速您与我们前沿产品和API的集成。无论您是要部署SAML Jackson、在Express.js和Next.js中实现Directory Sync，还是将SAML Jackson集成到Django、Laravel、Next.js、Remix或Rails等框架中，我们不断扩展的资源库都是您的首选参考。

segments.source_content: Each guide is meticulously designed to provide clear, step-by-step instructions, ensuring developers can quickly and efficiently leverage BoxyHQ's solutions in various environments. Our comprehensive tutorials cover a wide range of applications, tailored to meet the needs of both novice and experienced developers.

translations.zh-CN: 每份指南都经过精心设计，提供清晰的分步说明，确保开发者能在各种环境中快速高效地利用BoxyHQ的解决方案。我们全面的教程涵盖广泛的应用场景，既能满足新手开发者的需求，也能为经验丰富的开发者提供支持。

segments.source_content: As we continuously update and expand our content, you’ll always have the latest insights and best practices at your fingertips, ensuring your projects are not just compliant, but also at the forefront of technological innovation.

translations.zh-CN: 随着我们持续更新和扩充内容，您将始终掌握最新的技术洞察和最佳实践，确保您的项目不仅合规，还能站在技术创新的前沿。

segments.source_content:
Enterprise SSO

An SAML SSO service designed as an OAuth 2.0 or OpenID Connect flow. Integrate SAML and OIDC with just a few lines of code.

Directory Sync (SCIM 2.0)

Directory Sync service that helps organizations automate the provisioning and de-provisioning of their users.
